author: KirkMunro
body: When I'm working on PRs, the version of PowerShell that gets built is 6.0.0-alpha.10. I'd like to change that to 7.0.0-alpha.10 (or whatever...I just want it to be 7.0 since I'm working on 7.0-related functionality). Where is that base version set so that I can change it?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I believe you need to just run: git fetch --all --tags

comments.author: KirkMunro
comments.body: Wonderful, that was exactly what I needed. Thanks @SteveL-MSFT!

title: Make 7.0 be the base version for builds
